## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description | Type                | Default |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ----------- | ------------------- | ------- |
| `toolbarPosition` | `toolbar-position` |             | `"bottom" \| "top"` | `'top'` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                   | Description                                          |
| ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| `--st-indicator-color` | Indicator color. Defaults to `--ion-color-contrast`. |
